author: Roman Silin
description: Ready-to-use forward shading lighting for 3D games. Just set the provided material to your mesh and place light sources on the scene.
name: Illumination

releases.message:
### Fixed

- #12 Fixed samplers order which was causing the library to not work on HTML5 starting from Defold 1.6.3.

### Fixed

- https://github.com/astrochili/defold-illumination/issues/11 Support for Defold 1.6.3. Fixed texture property hash by alphabet order.

- Added new `surface.z` property of the material to allow to use DirectX normal maps.
- Fixed the horizontal channel in demo's normal maps.
- https://github.com/astrochili/defold-illumination/issues/3 Fixed blinking in the specular reflection of the sunlight during rotation.

![github](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/4752473/185742236-ea3a9dc0-a4a6-4a4e-aed9-f714cc8174e6.jpg)

Initial release.

- [x] Linear and radial fog.
- [x] Ambient lighting.
- [x] Directional lighting.
- [x] Light points and spots.
- [x] Everything can be animated with `go.animate()`.
- [x] Support for baked light maps (also can be used as emission maps).
- [x] Support for specular maps.
- [x] Support for normal maps.
